K06bsu028pu:3: 1 atha khalu bhagavāṃstāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃpraharṣaṇārthaṃ punarapīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridīpayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata
K06bsu028pu:4: para prema gaurava prasāda upasthapitvā prajahitva āvaraṇa kleśamalātikrāntāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:6: tānāṃ prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti śūrāḥ // Rgs_1.1 //
K06bsu028pu:7: yāvanti nadya pravahantiha jambudvīpe phala puṣpa auṣadhā(dhi)
K06bsu028pu:12: yāvanti dharma jinaśrāvaka deśayanti bhāṣanti yuktisahitāṃśca udīrayanti /
K06bsu028pu:13: paramārthasaukhyakriya tatphalaprāptitā ca sarvo ayaṃ puruṣakāru tathāgatasya // Rgs_1.3 //
K06bsu028pu:14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ya jina bhāṣati dharmanetrīṃ tatrābhiśikṣita nararṣabhaśiṣyabhūtāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:15: sākṣātkaritva yatha śikṣita deśayanti buddhānubhāva puna ātmabalānubhāvā // Rgs_1.4 //
K06bsu028pu:16: yasminna prajñavarapāramitopalabdhiḥ na ca bodhisattvaupalabdhi na cittabodheḥ /
K06bsu028pu:17: evaṃ śruṇitva na ca muhyati nāsti trāso so bodhi(sa)
K06bsu028pu:19: na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanā ca vijñāna sthānu aṇumātra na bhonti tasya /
K06bsu028pu:22: atha śreṇikasya abhutī parivrājakasya jñānopalambhu na hi skandhavibhāvanā ca /
K06bsu028pu:23: yo bodhisattva parijānati eva dharmāṃ na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām // Rgs_1.7 //
K06bsu028pu:24: vyuparīkṣate punarayaṃ katareṣu prajñā kasmātkuto va imi śūnyaka sarva dharmāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:25: vyuparīkṣamāṇu na ca līyati nāsti trāso āsannu so bhavati bodhayi bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.8 //
K06bsu028pu:26: saci rupa saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna skandha caratī aprajānamāno /
K06bsu028pu:27: imi skandha śūnya parikalpayi bodhisattvo caratī nimittaanupādapade asakto // Rgs_1.9 //
K06bsu028pu:28: na ca rupa vedana na saṃjña na cetanāyā vijñāni yo na caratī aniketacārī /
K06bsu028pu:29: caratīti so na upagacchati prajñadhārī anupādadhī spṛśati śānti samādhi śreṣṭhām // Rgs_1.10 //
K06bsu028pu:30: evātmaśānti viharanniha bodhisattvo so vyākṛto puramakehi tathāgatehi /
K06bsu028pu:31: na ca manyate ahu samādhitu vyutthito vā kasmārtha dharmaprakṛtiṃ parijānayitvā // Rgs_1.11 //
K06bsu028pu:32: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ no cāpi so labhati yatra carāti dharmam /
K06bsu028pu:33: caraṇaṃ ca so 'caraṇaṃ ca prajānayitvā eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.12 //
K06bsu028pu:34: yo 'sau na vidyati sa eṣa avidyamāno tāṃ bālu kalpayi avidya karoti vidyām /
K06bsu028pu:35: vidyā avidya ubhi eti asanta dharmā niryāti yo iti prajānati bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.13 //
K06bsu028pu:36: māyopamāṃ ya iha jānati pañca skandhāṃ na ca māya anya na ca skandha karoti anyān /
K06bsu028pu:37: nānātvasaṃjñavigato upaśāntacārī eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.14 //
K06bsu028pu:38: kalyāṇamitrasahitasya vipaśyakasya trāso na bheṣyati śruṇitva jināna mātrām /
K06bsu028pu:39: yo pāpamitrasahito ca parapraṇeyo so āmabhājana yathodakaspṛṣṭa bhinno // Rgs_1.15 //
K06bsu028pu:40: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ayu pravucyati bodhisattvo sarvatra saṅgakriya icchati saṅgachedī /
K06bsu028pu:41: bodhiṃ spṛśiṣyati jināna asaṅgabhūtāṃ tasmāddhi nāma labhate ayu bodhisattvo // Rgs_1.16 //
K06bsu028pu:42: mahasattva so 'tha kenocyati kāraṇena mahatāya atra ayu bheṣyati sattvarāśeḥ /
K06bsu028pu:43: dṛṣṭīgatāṃ mahati chindati sattvadhātoḥ mahasattva tena hi pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.17 //
K06bsu028pu:44: mahanāyako mahatabuddhi mahānubhāvo mahayāna uttamajināna samādhirūḍho /
K06bsu028pu:45: mahatā sanaddhu namuciṃ śaṭha dharṣayiṣye mahasattva tena hi pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.18 //
K06bsu028pu:46: māyākaro yatha catuṣpathi nirmiṇitvā mahato janasya bahu chindati śīrṣakoṭī /
K06bsu028pu:47: yatha te ca māya tatha jānati sarvasattvāṃ nirmāṇu sarva jagato na ca tasya trāso // Rgs_1.19 //
K06bsu028pu:48: rupaṃ ca saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna bandhu na ca mukta asaṅgabhūto /
K06bsu028pu:49: evaṃ ca bodhi kramate na ca līnacitto saṃnā ha eṣa varapudgalauttamānām // Rgs_1.20 //
K06bsu028pu:50: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ayu pravucyati bodhiyāno yatrāruhitva sa nirvāpayi sarvasattvān /
K06bsu028pu:51: ākāśatulya ayu yāna mahāvimāno sukhasaukhyakṣemabhiprāpaṇu yānaśreṣṭho // Rgs_1.21 //
K06bsu028pu:52: na ca labhyate ya vrajate diśa āruhitvā nirvāṇaokagamanaṃ gati nopalabdhiḥ /
K06bsu028pu:53: yatha agni nirvṛtu na tasya gatipracāro so tena nirvṛti pravucyati kāraṇena // Rgs_1.22 //
K06bsu028pu:54: pūrvāntato na upalabhyati bodhisattvo aparāntato 'pi pratiupanna triyadhvaśuddho /
K06bsu028pu:55: yo śuddha so anabhisaṃskṛtu niṣprapañco eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.23 //
K06bsu028pu:56: yasmiṃś ca kāli samaye vidu bodhisattvo evaṃ carantu anupādu vicintayitvā /
K06bsu028pu:57: mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.24 //
K06bsu028pu:58: saci sattvasaṃjña dukhasaṃjña upādayātī hariṣyāmi duḥkha jagatīṃ kariṣyāmi artham /
K06bsu028pu:60: parikalpaku bodhisattvo na ca eṣa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.25 //
K06bsu028pu:61: yatha ātmanaṃ tatha prajānati sarvasattvāṃ yatha sarvasattva tatha prajānati sarvadharmān /
K06bsu028pu:62: anupādupādu ubhaye avikalpamāno eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.26 //
K06bsu028pu:63: yāvanti loki parikīrtita dharmanāma sarveṣupādasamatikramu nirgamitvā /
K06bsu028pu:64: amṛtaṃ ti jñānu paramaṃ na tu yo pareṇa ekārtha prajña ayu pāramiteti nāmā // Rgs_1.27 //
K06bsu028pu:65: evaṃ carantu na ca kāṅkṣati bodhisattvo jñātavya yo vihara te sa upāyaprajño /
K06bsu028pu:66: prakṛtīasanta parijānayamāna dharmāṃ eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_1.28 //
K06bsu028pu:68: rupasmi yo na sthihate na ca vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāya yo na sthihate na ca cetanāyām /
K06bsu028pu:69: vijñāni yo na sthihate sthitu dharmatāyāṃ eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_2.1 //
K06bsu028pu:72: phalaprāptitāya athito arahantabhūmau pratyekabhūmiathito tatha buddhabhūmau // Rgs_2.2 //
K06bsu028pu:73: yatha nāyako 'sthitaku dhātuasaṃskṛtāyā tatha saṃskṛtāya athito aniketacārī /
K06bsu028pu:74: evaṃ ca sthānu athito sthita bodhisattvo asthānu sthānu ayu sthānu jinena ukto // Rgs_2.3 //
K06bsu028pu:75: yo icchatī sugataśrāvaka haṃ bhaveyaṃ pratyekabuddha bhaviyāṃ tatha dharmarājo /
K06bsu028pu:76: imu kṣāntyanāgami na śakyati prāpuṇetuṃ yatha ārapāragamanāya atītadarśī // Rgs_2.4 //
K06bsu028pu:77: yo dharma bhāṣyati ya bhāṣyati bhāṣyamāṇāṃ phalaprāpta pratyayajino tatha lokanātho /
K06bsu028pu:78: nirvāṇato adhigato vidupaṇḍitehi sarve ta ātmaja nidṛṣṭa tathāgatena // Rgs_2.5 //
K06bsu028pu:79: catvāri pudgala ime na trasanti ye 'smin jinaputra satyakuśalo avivartiyaśca /
K06bsu028pu:80: arhaṃ vidhūtamalakleśa prahīṇakāṅkṣo kalyāṇamitraparipācita yaścaturthaḥ // Rgs_2.6 //
K06bsu028pu:81: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo nārhaṃmi śikṣati na pratyayabuddhabhūmau /
K06bsu028pu:82: sarvajñatāya anuśikṣati buddhadharme śikṣāaśikṣa na ya śikṣati eṣa śikṣā // Rgs_2.7 //
K06bsu028pu:83: na ca rupavṛddhiparihāṇiparigrahāye na ca śikṣati vividhadharmaparigrahāye /
K06bsu028pu:84: sarvajñatāṃ ca parigṛhṇati śikṣamāṇo niryāyatī ya iya śikṣa guṇe ratānām // Rgs_2.8 //
K06bsu028pu:85: rupe na prajña iti rupi na asti prajñā vijñāna saṃjña api vedana cetanā ca /
K06bsu028pu:86: na ca eti prajña iti teṣa na asti prajñā ākāśadhātusama tasya na cāsti bhedaḥ // Rgs_2.9 //
K06bsu028pu:88: ntapārā sattvāna yā ca prakṛtī sa anantapārā /
K06bsu028pu:89: ākāśadhātuprakṛtī sa anantapārā prajñā pi lokavidunāṃ sa anantapārā // Rgs_2.10 //
K06bsu028pu:90: saṃjñeti nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena saṃjñāṃ vibhāviya prahāṇa vrajanti pāram /
K06bsu028pu:91: ye atra saṃjñavigamaṃ anuprāpnuvanti te pāraprāpta sthita pāramite hu bhonti // Rgs_2.11 //
K06bsu028pu:92: saci gaṅgavālukasamāni sthihitva kalpāṃ sattveti śabda parikīrtayi nāyako 'yam /
K06bsu028pu:93: sattvasyupādu kutu bheṣyati ādiśuddho eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_2.12 //
K06bsu028pu:94: evaṃ jino bhaṇati apratikūlabhāṇī yadahaṃ imāya varapāramitāya āsī /
K06bsu028pu:95: tada vyākṛto 'hu parāpuruṣottamena buddho bhaviṣyasi anāgataadhvanasmin // Rgs_2.13 //
K06bsu028pu:97: ya imāṃ grahīṣyati paryāpuṇatī sa nityaṃ prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti nāthāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:98: viṣa vahni śastra udakaṃ na kramāti tasyo otāru māru na ca vindati mārapakṣo // Rgs_3.1 //
K06bsu028pu:99: parinirvṛtasya sugatasya kareyya stūpāṃ pūjeya saptaratanāmayu kaścideva /
K06bsu028pu:100: tehi prapūrṇa siya kṣetrasahasrakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikasamaiḥ sugatasya stūpaiḥ // Rgs_3.2 //
K06bsu028pu:101: yāvanta sattva puna tāntaka kṣetrakoṭyo te sarvi pūjana kareyuranantakalpān /
K06bsu028pu:102: divyehi puṣpavaragandhavilepanehi kalpāṃstriyadhvaparikalpa tato 'pi bhūyaḥ // Rgs_3.3 //
K06bsu028pu:103: yaśco imāṃ sugatamāta likhitva puste yata utpatī daśabalāna vināyakānām /
K06bsu028pu:104: dhāreyi satkarayi puṣpavilepanehi kala puṇya bhonti na sa stūpi karitva pūjām // Rgs_3.4 //
K06bsu028pu:105: mahavidya prajña ayu pāramitā janānāṃ dukhadharmaśokaśamanī pṛthusattvadhātoḥ /
K06bsu028pu:106: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśa lokanāthā ima vidya śikṣita anuttaravaidyarājāḥ // Rgs_3.5 //
K06bsu028pu:107: ye vā caranti cariyāṃ hitasānukampām iha vidyaśikṣita vidu spṛśiṣyanti bodhim /
K06bsu028pu:108: ye saukhya saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta ye ca saukhyā sarve ca saukhya prasutā itu veditavyāḥ // Rgs_3.6 //
K06bsu028pu:109: bījāḥ prakīrṇa pṛthivīsthita saṃbhavanti sāmagri labdhva viruhanti anekarupāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:110: yāvanti bodhiguṇa pāramitāśca pañca prajñāya pāramita te viruhanti sarve // Rgs_3.7 //
K06bsu028pu:111: yenaiva rāja vrajate sa ha cakravartī tenaiva sapta ratanā balakāya sarve /
K06bsu028pu:112: yenaiva prajña iya pāramitā jinānāṃ tenaiva sarvaguṇadharma samāgamanti // Rgs_3.8 //
K06bsu028pu:114: śakro jinena paripṛcchitu praśnamāhu saci gaṅgavālikasamā siya buddhakṣetrāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:115: jinadhātu sarvi paripūrita cūḍibaddhā imameva prajñavarapāramitāhu gṛhṇe // Rgs_4.1 //
K06bsu028pu:116: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na mi śarīri agauravatvaṃ api tū khu prajñaparibhāvita pūjayanti /
K06bsu028pu:117: yatha rājaniśrita naro labhi sarvi pūjāṃ tatha prajñapāramitaniśrita buddhadhātuḥ // Rgs_4.2 //
K06bsu028pu:118: maṇiratna sarvi guṇayukta anarghaprāpto yasmiṃ karaṇḍaki bhave sa namasyanīyaḥ /
K06bsu028pu:119: tasyāpi uddhṛta spṛhanti karaṇḍakasmiṃ tasyaiva te guṇa mahāratanasya bhonti // Rgs_4.3 //
K06bsu028pu:120: emeva prajñavarapāramitāguṇāni yannirvṛte 'pi jinadhātu labhanti pūjām /
K06bsu028pu:122: parighettukāmo so prajñapāramita gṛhṇatu eṣa mokṣo // Rgs_4.4 //
K06bsu028pu:123: pūrvaṃgamā bhavatu dānu dadantu prajñā śīle ca kṣānti tatha vīrya tathaiva dhyāne /
K06bsu028pu:124: parigrāhikā kuśaladharmaavipraṇāśe ekā ca sā api nidarśayi sarvadharmān // Rgs_4. 5 //
K06bsu028pu:125: yatha jambudvīpi bahuvṛkṣasahasrakoṭī nānāprakāra vividhāśca anekarūpāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:126: na vi chāyanānatu bhaveta viśeṣatāpi anyatra chāyagatasaṃkhya prabhāṣamāṇā // Rgs_4.6 //
K06bsu028pu:127: emeva pañca imi pāramitā jinānāṃ prajñāya pāramita nāmatayā bhavanti /
K06bsu028pu:128: sarvajñatāya pariṇāmayamāṇa sarve ṣaḍapīha ekanayamarchati bodhināmā // Rgs_4.7 //
K06bsu028pu:130: saci rūpa saṃjña api vedana cetanāyāṃ cittaṃ anitya pariṇāmayi bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:131: pra(ti)varṇikāya carate aprajānamāno na hi dharma paṇḍita vināśa karoti jātu // Rgs_5.1 //
K06bsu028pu:132: yasmin na rūpa api vedana cāpi saṃjñā vijñāna naiva na pi cetanayopalabdhiḥ /
K06bsu028pu:133: anupādu śūnya na ya jānati sarvadharmān eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_5.2 //
K06bsu028pu:134: yāvanti gaṅganadivālikatulyakṣetre tāvanti sattva arahanti vineya kaścit /
K06bsu028pu:135: yaścaiva prajña ima pāramitā likhitvā parasattvi pustaku dadeya viśiṣṭapuṇyaḥ // Rgs_5.3 //
K06bsu028pu:136: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ta iha śikṣita vādiśreṣṭhā gamayanti dharma nikhilāniha śūnyatāyām /
K06bsu028pu:137: yāṃ śrutva śrāvaka spṛśanti vimukti śīghraṃ pratyekabodhi spṛśayanti ca buddhabodhim // Rgs_5.4 //
K06bsu028pu:138: asato 'ṅkurasya drumasaṃbhavu nāsti loke kuta śākhapatraphalapuṣpaupādu tatra /
K06bsu028pu:139: vina bodhicitta jinasaṃbhavu nāsti loke kuta śakrabrahmaphala śrāvakaprādubhāvaḥ // Rgs_5.5 //
K06bsu028pu:140: ādityamaṇḍalu yadā prabhajāla muñcī karmakriyāsu tada sattva parākramanti /
K06bsu028pu:141: tatha bodhicitta sada lokavidusya jñāto jñānena sarvaguṇadharma samāgamanti // Rgs_5.6 //
K06bsu028pu:142: yatha nopatapta asato bhujagādhipasya kuta nadyaprasravu bhavediha jambudvīpe /
K06bsu028pu:143: asatā nadīya phalapuṣpa na saṃbhaveyuḥ na ca sāgarāṇa ratanā bhavi naikarūpāḥ // Rgs_5.7 //
K06bsu028pu:144: tatha bodhicitta asatīha tathāgatasya kuta jñānaprasravu bhavediha sarvaloke /
K06bsu028pu:145: jñānasya co asati nāsti guṇāna vṛddhiḥ na ca bodhi sāgarasamā na ca buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_5.8 //
K06bsu028pu:146: yāvanti loki kvaci jotikaprāṇabhūtā obhāsanārtha prabha osarayanti sarve /
K06bsu028pu:147: varasūryamaṇḍalaviniḥsṛta ekaraśmī na kalā pi jyotikagaṇe siya sarvaābhāḥ // Rgs_5.9 //
K06bsu028pu:149: yāvanti śrāvakagaṇāḥ prasavanti puṇyaṃ dānaṃ ca śīlamapi bhāvanasaṃprayuktam /
K06bsu028pu:150: sa hi bodhisattva anumodana ekacitte na ca sarvaśrāvakagaṇe siya puṇyaskandho // Rgs_6.1 //
K06bsu028pu:151: ye buddhakoṭiniyutā purimā vyatītā ye vā anantabahukṣetrasahasrakoṭayaḥ /
K06bsu028pu:152: tiṣṭhanti ye 'pi parinirvṛta lokanāthā deśanti dharmaratanaṃ dukhasaṃkṣayāya // Rgs_6.2 //
K06bsu028pu:153: prathamaṃ upādu varabodhayi cittupādo yāvat su dharmakṣayakālu vināyakānām /
K06bsu028pu:154: ekasmi tatra ciya teṣa jināna puṇyaṃ saha yukta pāramita ye 'pi ca buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_6.3 //
K06bsu028pu:157: paripiṇḍayitva anumodayi bodhisattvo sarvaṃ ca nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhi // Rgs_6.4 //
K06bsu028pu:158: pariṇāmayantu yadi vartati cittasaṃjñā tatha bodhisattvapariṇāmana sattvasaṃjñā /
K06bsu028pu:159: saṃjñāya dṛṣṭisthitu citta trisaṅgayukto pariṇāmitaṃ na bhavatī upalabhyamānam // Rgs_6.5 //
K06bsu028pu:160: saci eva jānati nirudhyati kṣīṇadharmā taccaita kṣīṇa pariṇāmayiṣyanti yatra /
K06bsu028pu:161: na ca dharma dharmi pariṇāmayate kadācit pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati eva prajānamāne // Rgs_6.6 //
K06bsu028pu:162: saci so nimitta kurute na ca mānayāti atha ānimitta pariṇāmita bhonti bodhau /
K06bsu028pu:163: viṣasṛṣṭa bhojanu yathaiva kriyāpraṇīto tatha śukladharmaupalambha jinena ukto // Rgs_6.7 //
K06bsu028pu:164: tasmā hu nāmapariṇāmana śikṣitavyā yatha te jinā kuśala eva prajānayanti /
K06bsu028pu:165: yajjātiyo 'yaṃ prabhavo yadalakṣaṇaṃ ca anumodamī tatha tathā pariṇāmayāmi // Rgs_6.8 //
K06bsu028pu:166: evaṃ ca puṇya pariṇāmayamāna bodhau na ca so hi buddha kṣipate jina uktavādī /
K06bsu028pu:167: yāvanti loki upalambhikabodhisattvā abhibhonti sarvi pariṇāmayamāna śūro // Rgs_6.9 //
K06bsu028pu:170: vina prajña pañca imi pāramitā acakṣuḥ avināyakā na prabhavanti spṛśetu bodhim // Rgs_7.1 //
K06bsu028pu:171: yatrāntarasmi bhavate pragṛhīta prajñā tatu labdhacakṣu bhavatī imu nāmadheyam /
K06bsu028pu:172: yatha citrakarmapariniṣṭhita cakṣuhīno na ca tāva puṇyu labhate akaritva cakṣuḥ // Rgs_7.2 //
K06bsu028pu:173: yada dharma saṃskṛta asaṃskṛta kṛṣṇaśuklo aṇumātru no labhati prajña vibhāvamānaḥ /
K06bsu028pu:174: yada prajñapāramita gacchati saṃkhya loke ākāśa yatra na pratiṣṭhitu kiṃci tatra // Rgs_7.3 //
K06bsu028pu:175: saci manyate ahu carāmi jināna prajñāṃ mociṣya sattvaniyutāṃ bahurogaspṛṣṭān /
K06bsu028pu:176: ayu sattvasaṃjñaparikalpaku bodhisattvo na ca eṣa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_7.4 //
K06bsu028pu:177: yo bodhisattva varapāramiteti cīrṇo paricārikā ya na ca kāṅkṣati paṇḍitehi /
K06bsu028pu:178: saha śrutva tasya puna bheṣyati śāstṛsaṃjñā so vā laghū anubudhiṣyati bodhi śāntām // Rgs_7.5 //
K06bsu028pu:179: satkṛtya buddhaniyutāṃ paricārikāyāṃ na ca prajñapāramita śraddadhitā jinānām /
K06bsu028pu:180: śrutvā ca so imu kṣipiṣyati so 'lpabuddhiḥ sa kṣipitva yāsyati avīcimatrāṇabhūto // Rgs_7.6 //
K06bsu028pu:181: tasmā hu śraddadhata eva jināna mātāṃ yadi icchathā spṛśitu uttamabuddhajñānam /
K06bsu028pu:182: so vāṇijo yatha vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ mūlātu chedana karitva puna āgameyā // Rgs_7.7 //
K06bsu028pu:184: rūpasya śuddhi phalaśuddhita veditavyā phalarūpaśuddhita sarvajñataśuddhimāhuḥ /
K06bsu028pu:185: sarvajñatāya phalaśuddhita rūpaśuddhī ākāśadhātusamatāya abhinnachinnāḥ // Rgs_8.1 //
K06bsu028pu:186: traidhātukaṃ samatikrānta na bodhisattvā kleśāpanīta upapatti nidarśayanti /
K06bsu028pu:187: jaravyādhimṛtyuvigatāścyuti darśayanti prajñāya pāramita yatra caranti dhīrāḥ // Rgs_8.2 //
K06bsu028pu:188: nāmeva rūpi jagatī ayu paṅkasaktā saṃsāracakri bhramate 'nilacakratulye /
K06bsu028pu:189: jānitva bhrāntu jagatī mṛgavāgureva ākāśa pakṣisadṛśā vicaranti prajñāḥ // Rgs_8.3 //
K06bsu028pu:190: rūpasmi yo na carate pariśuddhacārī vijñāna saṃjña api vedana cetanāyām /
K06bsu028pu:191: evaṃ carantu parivarjayi sarvasaṅgāṃ saṅgādvimucya carate sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_8.4 //
K06bsu028pu:193: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo saṅgā uchinnu vrajate jagatī asakto /
K06bsu028pu:194: sūryo va rāhugrahamukta virocamāno agnīva yukta tṛṇakāṣṭhavanaṃ dahāti // Rgs_9.1 //
K06bsu028pu:195: prakṛtīya śuddha pariśuddhimi sarvadharmāṃ prajñāya pāramita paśyati bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:196: na ca paśyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca sarvadharmān eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_9.2 //
K06bsu028pu:198: śakro jinasya paripṛcchati devarājo caramāṇa prajña katha yujyati bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:199: aṇumātra yo na khalu yujyati skandhadhātau yo eva yujyati(sa yujyati)
K06bsu028pu:201: cirayānaprasthitu sa vedayitavya sattvo bahubuddhakoṭinayutehi kṛtādhikāro /
K06bsu028pu:202: yo śrutva dharmi imi nirmitamāyakalpāṃ na ca kāṅkṣate ayu prayujyati śikṣamāṇaḥ // Rgs_10.2 //
K06bsu028pu:204: janehi gopāla sīma vanasaṃpada paśyate yo /
K06bsu028pu:205: āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso abhyāśa grāmanagarāṇa ime nimittāḥ // Rgs_10.3 //
K06bsu028pu:206: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ śṛṇu tāta yo labhati bodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
K06bsu028pu:207: āśvāsaprāpta bhavatī na ca tasya trāso nārhantabhūmi na pi pratyayabuddhabhūmī // Rgs_10.4 //
K06bsu028pu:208: puruṣo hi sāgarajalaṃ vraji paśyanāya saci paśyate drumavanaspatiśailarājam /
K06bsu028pu:209: athavā na paśyati nimitta nikāṅkṣa bhoti a(bhyāśa)
K06bsu028pu:211: emeva bodhivaraprasthitu veditavyo śruṇamāṇa prajña imi pāramitā jinānām /
K06bsu028pu:212: yadyāpi saṃmukha na vyākṛtu nāyakeno tathapi spṛśiṣyati nacireṇa hu buddhabodhim // Rgs_10.6 //
K06bsu028pu:213: suvasanti kāli patite tṛṇapatraśākhā nacireṇa patraphalapuṣpa samāgamanti /
K06bsu028pu:214: prajñāya pāramita yasyimu hastaprāptā nacireṇa bodhivara prāpsyati nāyakānām // Rgs_10.7 //
K06bsu028pu:215: yatha istri gurviṇi ya ceṣṭati vedanābhi jñātavyu kālu ayamasya prajāyanāya /
K06bsu028pu:216: tatha bodhisattva śruṇamāṇu jināna prajñāṃ rati chanda vīkṣati spṛśiṣyati bodhi śīghram // Rgs_10.8 //
K06bsu028pu:217: caramāṇu prajñavarapāramitāya yogī na ca rūpavṛddhi na ca paśyati pārihāṇim /
K06bsu028pu:218: dharmā adharma imu paśyati dharmadhātuṃ na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati so viharāti prajñām // Rgs_10.9 //
K06bsu028pu:219: caramāṇu yo na iha kalpayi buddhadharmāṃ bala ṛddhipāda na ca kalpayi bodhi śāntām /
K06bsu028pu:220: avikalpakalpavigato 'dhiṣṭhānacārī eṣā sa prajñavarapāramitāya caryā // Rgs_10.10 //
K06bsu028pu:222: buddhaṃ subhūti paripṛcchati vādicandraṃ kyantantarāyu bhaviṣyanti guṇe ratānām /
K06bsu028pu:223: bahu antarāyu bhaviṣyanti bhaṇāti śāsta tatu alpamātra parikīrtayiṣyāmi tāvat // Rgs_11.1 //
K06bsu028pu:224: pratibhāna neka vividhāni upapadyiṣyanti likhamāna prajña imu pāramitā jinānām /
K06bsu028pu:225: yuta śīghra vidyuta yathā parihāyiṣyanti akaritva artha jagatī imu mārakarma // Rgs_11.2 //
K06bsu028pu:226: kāṅkṣā ca keṣaci bhaviṣyati bhāṣamāṇe na mamātra nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena /
K06bsu028pu:227: na ca jāti bhūmi parikīrtitu nāpi gotraṃ na ca so śruṇiṣyati kṣipiṣyati mārakarma // Rgs_11.3 //
K06bsu028pu:228: evaṃ ta mūlamapahāya ajānamāno śākhāpalāśa parieṣayiṣyanti mūḍhāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:229: hastiṃ labhitva yatha hastipadaṃ gaveṣe tatha prajñapāramita śrutva sūtrānta eṣet // Rgs_11.4 //
K06bsu028pu:230: yatha bhojanaṃ śatarasaṃ labhiyāna kaścit mārgeṣu ṣaṣṭiku labhitva sa bhojanāgryam /
K06bsu028pu:234: satkārakāma bhaviṣyanti ca lābhakāmāḥ sāpekṣacitta kulasaṃstavasaṃprayuktāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:235: choritva dharma kariṣyanti adharmakāryaṃ patha hitva utpathagatā ima mārakarma // Rgs_11.6 //
K06bsu028pu:236: ye cāpi tasmi samaye imu dharma śreṣṭhaṃ śruṇanāya chandika utpādayiṣyanti śraddhām /
K06bsu028pu:237: te dharmabhāṇaka viditvana kāryayuktaṃ premāpanīta gamiṣyanti sudurmanāśca // Rgs_11.7 //
K06bsu028pu:238: imi mārakarma bhaviṣyanti ya tasmi kāle anye ca neka vividhā bahu antarāyā /
K06bsu028pu:239: yehī samākulikṛtā bahu bhikṣu tatra prajñāya pāramita etu na dhārayanti // Rgs_11.8 //
K06bsu028pu:240: ye te bhavanti ratanā ya anarghaprāptā te durlabhā bahupratyarthika nityakālam /
K06bsu028pu:241: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ baddupadravaṃ ca // Rgs_11.9 //
K06bsu028pu:242: navayānaprasthita sa sattva parīttabuddhiḥ ya imaṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ parāpuṇanti /
K06bsu028pu:243: māro 'tra utsuku bhaviṣyati antarāye buddhā daśaddiśi parigrahasaṃprayuktāḥ // Rgs_11.10 //
K06bsu028pu:245: mātrāya putra bahu santi gilāni kāye te sarvi durmanasa tatra prayujyayeyuḥ /
K06bsu028pu:247: daśaddiśi lokadhātau ima prajñapāramita mātra samanvāharanti // Rgs_12.1 //
K06bsu028pu:248: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśi lokanāthā itu te prasūta bhaviṣyantyanāgatāśca /
K06bsu028pu:249: loka(sya) darśika janetri jināna mātā parasattvacittacaritāna nidarśitā(kā) ca // Rgs_12.2 //
K06bsu028pu:252: ekaiva bhāvavigatā tathatā ananyā prajñāya pāramita buddha tathāgatena // Rgs_12.3 //
K06bsu028pu:253: tiṣṭhantu lokavidunāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ [sthita eṣa dharmataniyāma śūnyadharmā /
K06bsu028pu:254: tāṃ bodhisattva tathatāmanubuddhayanti tasmā hu buddha kṛta nāma tathāgatebhiḥ // Rgs_12.4 //
K06bsu028pu:255: ayu gocaro daśabalāna vināyakānāṃ] prajñāya pāramita ramyavanāśritānām /
K06bsu028pu:256: dukhitāṃśca sattva triapāya samuddharanti na pi sattvasaṃjña api teṣu kadāci bhoti // Rgs_12.5 //
K06bsu028pu:257: siṃho yathaiva girikandari niśrayitvā nadate achambhi mṛga kṣudraka trāsayanto /
K06bsu028pu:258: tatha prajñapāramitaniśraya narāṇa siṃho nadate achambhi pṛthutīrthika trāsayanto // Rgs_12.6 //
K06bsu028pu:259: ākāśaniśrita yathaiva hi sūrya[raśmi] tāpetimāṃ dharaṇi darśayate ca rūpam /
K06bsu028pu:260: tatha prajñapāramitaniśrita dharmarājo tāpeti tṛṣṇanadi dharma nidarśayāti // Rgs_12.7 //
K06bsu028pu:261: rūpasya darśanu adarśanu vedanāye saṃjñāya darśanu adarśanu cetanāye /
K06bsu028pu:262: vijñānacittamanudarśanu yatra nāsti aya dharmadarśanu nidiṣṭu tathāgatena // Rgs_12.8 //
K06bsu028pu:263: ākāśa dṛṣṭu iti sattva pravyāharanti nabhadarśanaṃ kutu vimṛṣyatha etamartham /
K06bsu028pu:264: tatha dharmadarśanu nidiṣṭa tathāgatena na hi darśanaṃ bhaṇitu śakya nidarśanena // Rgs_12.9 //
K06bsu028pu:266: yo eva paśyati sa paśyati sarvadharmān sarvānamātyakiriyā ti upekṣya rājā /
K06bsu028pu:267: yāvanti buddhakriya dharmata śrāvakāṇāṃ prajñāya pāramita sarva karoti tāni // Rgs_13.1 //
K06bsu028pu:268: na ca rāja grāma vrajate na ca rājyarāṣṭrān sarvaṃ ca ādadati so viṣayātu āyam /
K06bsu028pu:269: na ca bodhisattva calate kvaci dharmatāyāṃ sarvāṃśca ādadati ye guṇa buddhadharme // Rgs_13.2 //
K06bsu028pu:271: yasyāmi śraddha sugate dṛḍha bodhisattvo varaprajñapāramitaāśayasaṃprayogo /
K06bsu028pu:272: atikramya bhūmidvaya śrāvakapratyayānāṃ laghu prāpsyate anabhibhū(tu)
K06bsu028pu:274: sāmudriyāya yatha nāvi praluptikāye bhṛtakaṃ manuṣya tṛṇakāṣṭhamagṛhṇamāno /
K06bsu028pu:275: vilayaṃ prayāti jalamadhya aprāptatīro yo gṛhṇate vrajati pārasthalaṃ prayāti // Rgs_14.2 //
K06bsu028pu:276: emeva śraddhasaṃgato ya prasādaprāpto prajñāya pāramita mātra vivarjayanti /
K06bsu028pu:277: saṃsārasāgara tadā sada saṃsaranti jātījarāmaraṇaśokataraṃgabhaṅge // Rgs_14.3 //
K06bsu028pu:278: ye te bhavanti varaprajñaparigṛhītā bhāvasvabhāvakuśalā paramārthadarśī /
K06bsu028pu:279: te puṇyajñānadhanasaṃbhṛtayānapātrāḥ paramādbhutāṃ sugatabodhi spṛśanti śīghram // Rgs_14.4 //
K06bsu028pu:280: ghaṭake apakvi yatha vāri vaheya kācit jñātavyu kṣipra ayu bhetsyati durbalatvāt /
K06bsu028pu:281: paripakvi vāri ghaṭake vahamānu mārge na ca bhedanādbhayamupaiti ca svasti geham // Rgs_14.5 //
K06bsu028pu:282: kiṃcāpi śraddhabahulo siya bodhisattvo prajñāvihīna vilayaṃ laghu prāpuṇāti /
K06bsu028pu:283: taṃ caiva śraddha parigṛhṇayamāna prajñā atikramya bodhidvaya prāpsyati agrabodhim // Rgs_14.6 //
K06bsu028pu:284: nāvā yathā aparikarmakṛtā samudre vilayamupaiti sadhanā saha vāṇijebhiḥ /
K06bsu028pu:285: sā caiva nāva parikarmakṛtā suyuktā na ca bhidyate dhanasamagramupaiti tīram // Rgs_14.7 //
K06bsu028pu:286: emeva śraddhaparibhāvitu bodhisattvo prajñāvihīnu laghu bodhimupaiti hānim /
K06bsu028pu:287: so caiva prajñavarapāramitāsuyukto 'kṣato 'nupāhatu spṛśāti jināna bodhim // Rgs_14.8 //
K06bsu028pu:288: puruṣo hi jīrṇa dukhito śataviṃśavarṣo kiṃcāpi utthitu svayaṃ na prabhoti gantum /
K06bsu028pu:289: so vāmadakṣiṇadvaye puruṣe gṛhīte patanādbhayaṃ na bhavate vrajate sukhena // Rgs_14.9 //
K06bsu028pu:290: emeva prajña iha durbalu bodhisattvo kiṃcāpi prasthihati bhajyati antareṇa /
K06bsu028pu:291: so vā upāyabalaprajñaparigṛhīto na ca bhajyate spṛśati bodhi nararṣabhāṇām // Rgs_14.10 //
K06bsu028pu:293: yo ādikarma sthitu bhūmiya bodhisattvo adhyāśayena vara prasthita buddhabodhim /
K06bsu028pu:294: tehī suśiṣyagurugauravasaṃprayukto kalyāṇamitra sada sevayitavya vijñaiḥ // Rgs_15.1 //
K06bsu028pu:295: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tatu guṇāgamu paṇḍitānāṃ prajñāya pāramita te anuśāsayanti /
K06bsu028pu:296: evaṃ jino bhaṇati sarvaguṇāgradhārī kalyāṇamitramupaniśrita buddhadharmāḥ // Rgs_15.2 //
K06bsu028pu:297: dānaṃ ca śīlamapi kṣānti tathaiva vīryaṃ dhyānāni prajña pariṇāmayitavya bodhau /
K06bsu028pu:298: na ca bodhiskandha vimṛśitva parāmṛśeyā ye ādikarmika na deśayitavya evam // Rgs_15.3 //
K06bsu028pu:299: evaṃ caranta guṇasāgara vādicandrāḥ trāṇā bhavanti jagatī śaraṇā ca lenā /
K06bsu028pu:300: gati buddhi dvīpa pariṇāyaka arthakāmāḥ pradyota ulka varadharmakathī akṣobhyāḥ // Rgs_15.4 //
K06bsu028pu:301: saṃnāhu duṣkarū mahāyaśu saṃnahantī na ca skandhadhātu na ca āyatanaiḥ sanaddhāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:302: tribhi yānasaṃjñavigatā aparigṛhītā avivartikā acalitāśca akopyadharmāḥ // Rgs_15.5 //
K06bsu028pu:304: prajñāya pāramita śrutva na sīdayanti aparapraṇeya avivartiya veditavyāḥ // Rgs_15.6 //
K06bsu028pu:305: gambhīra dharma ayu durdṛśu nāyakānāṃ na ca kenacīdadhigato na ca prāpuṇanti /
K06bsu028pu:306: etārthu bodhimadhigamya hitānukampī alpotsuko ka imu jñāsyati sattvakāyo // Rgs_15.7 //
K06bsu028pu:307: sattvaśca ālayarato viṣayābhilāṣī sthita agrahe abudha yo mahaandhabhūto /
K06bsu028pu:308: dharmo anālayu anāgrahu prāpitavyo lokena sārdha ayu vigrahu prādubhūto // Rgs_15.8 //
K06bsu028pu:310: ākāśadhātu purimādiśi dakṣiṇāyāṃ tatha paścimottaradiśāya anantapārā /
K06bsu028pu:311: uparādharāya daśaddiśi yāvadasti nānātvatā na bhavate na viśeṣaprāptā // Rgs_16.1 //
K06bsu028pu:312: atikrānta yā tathata yā tathatā aprāptā pratyutpanna yā tathata yā tathatārhatānām /
K06bsu028pu:313: yā sarvadharmatathatā tathatārhatānāṃ sarveṣa dharmatathatā na viśeṣaprāptā // Rgs_16.2 //
K06bsu028pu:314: yo bodhisattva imi icchati prāpuṇetuṃ nānātvadharmavigatāṃ sugatāna bodhim /
K06bsu028pu:315: prajñāya pāramita yujyatu yāya yukto vina prajña nāstyadhigamo naranāyakānām // Rgs_16.3 //
K06bsu028pu:316: pakṣisya yojanaśataṃ mahatātmabhāvo pañcāśatā pi abalobhayakṣīṇapakṣo /
K06bsu028pu:317: so trāyatriṃśabhavanādiṣu jambudvīpe ātmānamosariyi taṃ vilayaṃ vrajeyyā // Rgs_16.4 //
K06bsu028pu:318: yadyāpi pañca ima pāramitā jinānāṃ bahukalpakoṭiniyutāṃ samudānayeyyā /
K06bsu028pu:319: praṇidhīnanantavipulāṃ sada sevya loke anupāya prajñavikalā pari śrāvakatve // Rgs_16.5 //
K06bsu028pu:320: niryāyanāya ya icchati buddhajñāne samacitta sarvajagatī pitṛmātṛsaṃjñā /
K06bsu028pu:321: hitacitta maitramana eva parākrameyyā akhilārjavo mṛdugirāya parākrameyyā // Rgs_16.6 //
K06bsu028pu:323: sthaviro subhūti paripṛcchati lokanāthaṃ araṇāya liṅga bhaṇahī guṇasāgarāṇām /
K06bsu028pu:324: avivartiyā yatha bhavanti mahānubhāvā tāṃ vyākuruṣva jinaguṇāna pradeśamātram // Rgs_17.1 //
K06bsu028pu:325: nānātvasaṃjñavigatā gira yuktabhāṇī na ca anya te śramaṇa brāhmaṇa āśrayanti /
K06bsu028pu:326: triyapāyavarjita vidū sadakāli bhonti daśabhiśca te kuśalakarmapathebhi yuktā // Rgs_17.2 //
K06bsu028pu:327: dharmaṃ nirāmiṣu jagasyanuśāsayanti ekāntadharmaniyatāḥ sada snigdhavākyāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:328: sthiticaṃkramaṃ śayaniṣadya susaṃprajānā yugamātraprekṣiṇa vrajantyabhrāntacintā // Rgs_17.3 //
K06bsu028pu:329: śuciśaucaambaradharā trivivekaśuddhā na ca lābhakāma vṛṣabhā sada dharmakāmāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:330: mārasyatītaviṣayā aparapraṇeyā catudhyānadhyāyi na ca niśrita tatra dhyāne // Rgs_17.4 //
K06bsu028pu:331: na ca kīrtikāma na ca krodhaparītacittā gṛhibhūta nitya anadhyoṣita sarva vastuṃ /
K06bsu028pu:332: na ca jīvikāviṣayabhoga gaveṣayanti abhicāramantra na ca istriprayogamantrāḥ // Rgs_17.5 //
K06bsu028pu:333: na ca ādiśanti puruṣaiḥ striya icchakarmāṃ pravivikta prajñavarapāramitābhiyuktāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:334: kalahāvivādavigatā dṛḍhamaitracittā sarvajñakāma sada śāsani nimnacittāḥ // Rgs_17.6 //
K06bsu028pu:336: dharmārtha jīvita tyajanti prayuktayogā avivartiyāna imi liṅga prajānitavyā // Rgs_17.7 //
K06bsu028pu:338: gambhīra rupa api vedana cetanā ca vijñāna saṃjña prakṛtī animittaśāntā /
K06bsu028pu:339: kāṇḍena gādha yatha sāgari eṣamāṇo prajñāya skandha vimṛṣitva alabdhagādhā // Rgs_18.1 //
K06bsu028pu:340: yo bodhisattva imu budhyati eva dharmāṃ gambhīrayānaparamārthanirupalepān /
K06bsu028pu:341: yasmin na skandha na pi āyatanaṃ na dhātu kiṃ vā svapuṇyasamudāgamu kiṃci tasya // Rgs_18.2 //
K06bsu028pu:342: yatha rāgadharmacaritaḥ puruṣaḥ striyāye saṃketa kṛtva alabhantu vivartayeyā /
K06bsu028pu:343: yāvanti cittacaritā divasena tasya tāvanta kalpa anubudhyati bodhisattvo // Rgs_18.3 //
K06bsu028pu:344: yo bodhisattva bahukalpasahasrakoṭayo dānaṃ dadeyu vimalaṃ tatha śīla rakṣe /
K06bsu028pu:345: yaścaiva prajñavarapāramitāprayukto dharmaṃ bhaṇeya kala puṇya na dānaśīle // Rgs_18.4 //
K06bsu028pu:346: yo bodhisattva varaprajña vibhāvayanto tata utthito kathayi dharma nirupalepam /
K06bsu028pu:347: taṃ cāpi nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau nāsti triloka śubha tena samaṃ bhaveyā // Rgs_18.5 //
K06bsu028pu:348: taṃ caiva puṇya puna khyāyati riktameva tatha śūnya tuccha vaśikaṃ ca asārakaṃ ca /
K06bsu028pu:349: evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñāṃ caramāṇu puṇyu parigṛhṇati aprameyam // Rgs_18.6 //
K06bsu028pu:350: abhilāpamātra ima jānati sarvadharmāṃ buddhena deśita prayukta prakāśitāṃśca /
K06bsu028pu:351: kalpāna koṭinayutāṃ bahu bhāṣamāṇo na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati dharmadhātuḥ // Rgs_18.7 //
K06bsu028pu:352: ye cāpi pañca imi pāramitā jinānām ete 'pi dharma parikīrtita nāmamātrāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:353: pariṇāmayāti na ca manyati bodhisattvo na ca hīyate spṛśati uttamabuddhabodhim // Rgs_18.8 //
K06bsu028pu:355: tailasya varti jvalitā prathame nipāte na ca dagdha varti asatā na vinā ya dagdhā /
K06bsu028pu:356: na hi arci paścimanipāta sa varti dagdhā asatā pi paścima na dahyati dīpavarti // Rgs_19.1 //
K06bsu028pu:357: prathameva citta spṛśatī na ca agrabodhim asatā na tasya spṛśatā puna śakya bhonti /
K06bsu028pu:358: na ca citta paścima śivāmanuprāpuṇāti asatā na tasya puna prāpaṇanāya śakyam // Rgs_19.2 //
K06bsu028pu:359: bījātu stamba phala puṣpa samāgamanti so vāniruddha asato na hi tasya vṛkṣo /
K06bsu028pu:360: emeva citta prathamaṃ tu nidāna bodheḥ so vā niruddha asato na hi tasya bodhiḥ // Rgs_19.3 //
K06bsu028pu:361: bījaṃ pratītya ca bhavedyavaśālikādes tattatphalaṃ na ca tadasti na cāpi nāsti /
K06bsu028pu:362: utpattito bhavati bodhiriyaṃ jinānāṃ bhāvasvabhāvavigatā bhavatīha māyā // Rgs_19.4 //
K06bsu028pu:363: udakabindu kumbha paripūryati stokastokaṃ prathame nipāti anupūrva sa paścimena /
K06bsu028pu:364: emeva citta prathamaṃ varabodhihetur anupūrva śuklaguṇapūrṇa bhavanti buddhāḥ // Rgs_19.5 //
K06bsu028pu:365: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ caramāṇu dharmā na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī /
K06bsu028pu:366: yatha nāviko kuśala gacchati ārapāram ubhayānti asthitu na tiṣṭhati arṇavesmin // Rgs_19.6 //
K06bsu028pu:367: evaṃ carantu na ca manyati bodhisattvo ahu vyākṛto daśabalehi spṛśeya bodhim /
K06bsu028pu:368: na ca trāsu bodhi bhavate na ihāsti kiṃcid evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_19.7 //
K06bsu028pu:369: kāntāramārgi durabhikṣi savyādhi lokāṃ paśyitva nāsti bhaya uttari saṃnahante /
K06bsu028pu:370: aparāntakoṭi sada yukta prajānamāno aṇumātra kheda manaso na upādiyāti // Rgs_19.8 //
K06bsu028pu:372: puna bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna prajñāṃ anupāda skandha imi jānati ādiśūnyān /
K06bsu028pu:373: asamāhito karuṇa prekṣati sattvadhātum atrāntare na parihāyati buddhadharmān // Rgs_20.1 //
K06bsu028pu:374: puruṣo yathā kuśala sarvaguṇairupeto balavān dudharṣu kṛtayogya kalāvidhijño /
K06bsu028pu:376: mātā pitā ca parigṛhya saputradāraṃ kāntāramārgi pratipadya bahūamitro /
K06bsu028pu:377: so nirmiṇitva puruṣān bahu śūravīrān kṣemeṇa gatva puna gehamupāgameyyā // Rgs_20.3 //
K06bsu028pu:378: emeva yasmi samaye vidu bodhisattvo mahamaitri sarvi upabandhati sattvadhātau /
K06bsu028pu:379: caturo sa māra atikramya dvaye ca bhūmim asmin samādhi sthitu no ca spṛśāti bodhim // Rgs_20.4 //
K06bsu028pu:380: ākāśaniśrita samīraṇa āpaskandho ta hi niśritā iha mahāpṛthivī jagacca /
K06bsu028pu:381: sattvāna karmaupabhoganidānameva ākāśasthānu kutu cintayi etamartham // Rgs_20.5 //
K06bsu028pu:382: emeva śūnyatapratiṣṭhitu eṣa sattvo jagati kriyāṃ vividha darśayate vicitrām /
K06bsu028pu:383: sattvāna jñānapraṇidhānaadhiṣṭhānameva na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati śūnyata nāsti sthānam // Rgs_20.6 //
K06bsu028pu:384: yasmiṃśca kāli vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo caratī imāṃ pravara śūnya samādhi śāntām /
K06bsu028pu:385: atrāntare na ca nimitta prabhāvitavyo na ca ānimittasthitu śānta praśāntacārī // Rgs_20.7 //
K06bsu028pu:386: pakṣisya nāsti padu gacchata antarīkṣe no cāpi tatra sthitu no ca patāti bhūmau /
K06bsu028pu:387: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāre na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati no ca nimittacārī // Rgs_20.8 //
K06bsu028pu:388: iṣvastraśikṣita yathā puruṣodha kāṇḍaṃ kṣepitva anya puna kāṇḍa paraspareṇa /
K06bsu028pu:389: patanāya tasya purimasya na deya bhūmim ākāṅkṣamāṇa puruṣasya pateya kāṇḍam // Rgs_20.9 //
K06bsu028pu:390: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto prajñā upāya bala ṛddhi vicāramāṇo /
K06bsu028pu:391: tāvanna tāṃ paramaśūnyata prāpuṇoti yāvanna te kuśalamūla bhavanti pūrṇāḥ // Rgs_20.10 //
K06bsu028pu:392: bhikṣū yathā paramaṛddhibalenupeto gagane sthito yamaka kurvati prātihāryāṃ /
K06bsu028pu:393: gaticaṃkramaṃ śayaniṣadya nidarśayāti na nivartate na pi ca khidyati yāva tatra // Rgs_20.11 //
K06bsu028pu:394: emeva śūnyatasthito vidu bodhisattvo jñānarddhipāramigato aniketacārī /
K06bsu028pu:395: vividhāṃ kriyāṃ jagati darśayate anantāṃ na ca bhajyatī na pi ca khidyati kalpakoṭī // Rgs_20.12 //
K06bsu028pu:396: puruṣā yathā mahaprapāti sthihitva kecid ubhi pāṇi chatradvaya gṛhṇa upakṣayeyyā /
K06bsu028pu:397: ākāli vāyuravasṛjya mahāprapāte no ca prapāta patiyāti na yāva tatra // Rgs_20.13 //
K06bsu028pu:398: emeva sthitva karuṇāṃ vidu bodhisattvo prajñāupāyadvayachatraparigṛhīto /
K06bsu028pu:399: śūnyānimittapraṇidhiṃ vimṛṣāti dharmān na ca nirvṛtiṃ spṛśati paśyati dharmacārī // Rgs_20.14 //
K06bsu028pu:400: ratanārthiko yatha vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna ratna puna gehamupāgameyyā /
K06bsu028pu:401: kiṃcāpi tatra sukha jīvati sārthavāho api duḥkhito manasi bhoti sa jātisaṃgho // Rgs_20.15 //
K06bsu028pu:402: emeva śūnyata vrajitvana ratnadvīpaṃ labdhvāna dhyāna bala indriya bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:403: kiṃcāpi nirvṛti spṛśedabhinandamāno api sarvasattva dukhitā manasī bhavanti // Rgs_20.16 //
K06bsu028pu:404: abhyantare ya nagare nigame ca grāme kāmārtha vāṇiju yathā gami jānanāya /
K06bsu028pu:405: no cāpi tatra sthihatī na ca ratnadvīpe na ca geha mārgi kuśalo puna bhoti vijño // Rgs_20.17 //
K06bsu028pu:406: tatha jñāna śrāvakavimuktisapratyayānāṃ sarvatra bhoti kuśalo vidu bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:407: no cāpi tatra sthihate na ca buddhajñāne na ca saṃskṛte bhavati mārgavidū vidhijño // Rgs_20.18 //
K06bsu028pu:408: yaṃ kāli maitri jagatī anubandhayitvā śūnyānimittapraṇidhī carate samādhim /
K06bsu028pu:409: asthānameva yadi nirvṛti prāpuṇeyā athavāpi saṃskṛta sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ // Rgs_20.19 //
K06bsu028pu:410: yatha nirmito puruṣa no va adṛśyakāyo nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ /
K06bsu028pu:411: tatha bodhisattva caramāṇu vimokṣadvāraṃ nāmena vā puna sa prajñapanāya śakyaḥ // Rgs_20.20 //
K06bsu028pu:412: yadi pṛcchamāna cari indriya bodhisattvo gambhīradharmaparidīpana no karoti /
K06bsu028pu:413: śūnyānimitta avivartiyabodhidharmāṃ na ca śocatī na ca sa vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.21 //
K06bsu028pu:414: arhantabhūmimapi pratyayabuddhabhūmau traidhātukaṃ na spṛśate supināntare 'pi /
K06bsu028pu:415: buddhāṃśca paśyati katheti janasya dharmaṃ avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.22 //
K06bsu028pu:416: triapāyaprāptu supinasmi viditva sattvān praṇidheti tatkṣaṇa apāya ucchoṣayeyam /
K06bsu028pu:417: satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti sa cāgniskandham avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyo // Rgs_20.23 //
K06bsu028pu:418: bhūtagrahā vividha vyādhaya martyaloke satyādhiṣṭhāni praśameti hitānukampī /
K06bsu028pu:419: na ca tena manyanupapadyati nāpi mānam avivartiyeti ayu vyākṛtu veditavyaḥ // Rgs_20.24 //
K06bsu028pu:421: athavāsya manyanupapadyati vyākṛto 'smi satyādhiṣṭhāna vividhāni samṛddhyayanti /
K06bsu028pu:422: yadi anya vyākṛtaku manyati bodhisattvo jñātavya manyanasthito ayu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.1 //
K06bsu028pu:423: nāmādhiṣṭhāna puna māra upāgamitvā evaṃ vadiṣyati idaṃ tava nāmadheyam /
K06bsu028pu:424: mātāpitāya anusaptamupaiti vaṃśo buddho yadā bhavi idaṃ tava nāmadheyam // Rgs_21.2 //
K06bsu028pu:425: dhutavṛtta yādṛśu sa bheṣyati yuktayogī pūrvaṃ pi tubhya imi āsi guṇovarūpā /
K06bsu028pu:426: yo eva śrutva abhimanyati bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.3 //
K06bsu028pu:427: pravivikta grāmanagare girikandarāṇi raṇyā vivikta vanaprastha niṣevamāṇo /
K06bsu028pu:428: ātmānukarṣi para paṃsayi bodhisattvo jñātavyu māru paryutthitu alpabuddhiḥ // Rgs_21.4 //
K06bsu028pu:429: grāme ca rāṣṭri nigame viharanti nityaṃ rahapratyayāni spṛhatāṃ janayanti tatra /
K06bsu028pu:430: anyatra sattvaparipācanabodhiyuktā eṣo viveku kathito sugatātmajānām // Rgs_21.5 //
K06bsu028pu:432: no cā viveku imu jānati bodhisattvo saṃkīrṇa so viharate adhimānaprāptaḥ // Rgs_21.6 //
K06bsu028pu:434: abhimanyate na imi raṇyavivekacārī na vivekagocaru ayaṃ hi jinena ukto // Rgs_21.7 //
K06bsu028pu:435: grāmānti yo viharate athavā araṇye dvayayānacittavigato niyato 'grabodhim /
K06bsu028pu:436: eṣo viveku jagadarthabhiprasthitānāṃ ātmā kṣiṇoti tulayeya sa bodhisattvo // Rgs_21.8 //
K06bsu028pu:438: tasmā hu mānu nihanitvana paṇḍitena guruāśayena varabodhi gaveṣamāṇaḥ /
K06bsu028pu:439: vaidyo va ātura svarogacikitsanārthaṃ kalyāṇamitra bhajitavya atandritena // Rgs_22.1 //
K06bsu028pu:440: buddhā ya bodhivaraprasthita bodhisattvā kalyāṇamitra imi pāramitā nidiṣṭāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:441: te cānuśāsaka iyaṃ pratipattibhūmī duvi kāraṇena anubudhyati buddhabodhim // Rgs_22.2 //
K06bsu028pu:442: atikrāntanāgata jinā sthita ye diśāsu sarveṣu mārgu ayu pāramitā ananyo /
K06bsu028pu:443: obhāsa ulka varabodhayi prasthitānām āloka śāstri imi pāramitā pradiṣṭāḥ // Rgs_22.3 //
K06bsu028pu:444: yatha prajñapāramita śūnyata lakṣaṇena tathalakṣaṇā ya imi jānati sarvadharmān /
K06bsu028pu:445: śūnyānalakṣaṇa prajānayamāna dharmān evaṃ carantu caratī sugatāna prajñām // Rgs_22.4 //
K06bsu028pu:446: āhārakāma parikalpayamāna sattvāḥ saṃsāri yuktamanasaḥ sada saṃsmaranti /
K06bsu028pu:447: ahu mahya dharma ubhi eti abhūta śūnyā ākāśagaṇṭhi ayu ātmana baddha bāle // Rgs_22.5 //
K06bsu028pu:448: yatha śaṅkitena viṣasaṃjñata abhyupaiti no cāsya koṣṭhagatu so viṣu pātyate ca /
K06bsu028pu:449: emeva bālupagato ahu mahya eṣo ahasaṃjñi jāyi mriyate ca sadā abhūto // Rgs_22.6 //
K06bsu028pu:450: yatha udgraho tatha prakāśitu saṃkileśo vyodāna ukta ahu mahya anopalabdhi /
K06bsu028pu:451: na hi atra kaści yo kliśyati śudhyate vā prajñāya pāramita budhyati bodhisattve // Rgs_22.7 //
K06bsu028pu:452: yāvanta sattva nikhile iha jambudvipe te sarvi bodhivaracitta upādayitvā /
K06bsu028pu:453: dānaṃ daditva bahuvarṣasahasrakoṭīḥ sarvaṃ ca nāmayi jagārthanidāna bodhau // Rgs_22.8 //
K06bsu028pu:454: yaścaiava prajñavarapāramitābhiyukto divasaṃ pi antamaśa ekanuvartayeyā /
K06bsu028pu:455: kalapuṇya so na bhavatī iha dānaskandho tadatandritena sada osaritavya prajñā // Rgs_22.9 //
K06bsu028pu:456: caramāṇu prajñavarapāramitāya yogī mahatīṃ janeti karuṇāṃ na ca sattvasaṃjñā /
K06bsu028pu:457: tada bhonti sarvajagatī vidu dakṣiṇīyā satataṃ amoghu paribhuñjati rāṣṭrapiṇḍam // Rgs_22.10 //
K06bsu028pu:458: cirabuddhadevamanujān triapāyi sattvān parimocituṃ ya iha icchati bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:459: pṛthumārgu tīru upadarśayi sattvadhātau prajñāya pāramita yukta divā ca rātrau // Rgs_22.11 //
K06bsu028pu:460: puruṣo ya agru ratanasya alabdhapūrvo aparasmi kāli puna labdhva bhaveya tuṣṭo /
K06bsu028pu:461: sa ha labdhva nāśayi puno 'pi pramādabhūto nāśitva duḥkhi satataṃ ratanābhikāṅkṣī // Rgs_22.12 //
K06bsu028pu:462: emeva bodhivaraprasthita ratnatulyo prajñāya pāramita yogu na riñcitavyo /
K06bsu028pu:463: ratanaṃ va labdhva gṛhamāṇu abhinnasattvo anubuddhayati tvarito śivamabhyupaiti // Rgs_22.13 //
K06bsu028pu:465: udayāti sūryu vigatāśca marīcimālā vidhamitva sarva tamasākulamandhakāram /
K06bsu028pu:466: avibhonti sarva krimijotikaprāṇabhūtāṃ sarvāṃśca tārakagaṇānapi candraābhām // Rgs_23.1 //
K06bsu028pu:467: emeva prajñavarapāramitāṃ caranto vidhamitva dṛṣṭigahanaṃ vidu bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:468: abhibhonti sarvajagatī rahapratyayāṃśca śūnyānimittacarito pṛthu bodhisattvo // Rgs_23.2 //
K06bsu028pu:469: yatha rājaputra dhanadāyaku arthakāmo sarveṣu śreṣṭha bhavate abhigāminīye /
K06bsu028pu:470: sa hyeṣa etarahi sattva pramocayāti prāgeva rājyasthitu bheṣyati paṭṭadhārī // Rgs_23.3 //
K06bsu028pu:471: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo amṛtasya dāyaku priyo marumānuṣāṇām /
K06bsu028pu:472: ayu eṣa eṣati hi sattvasukhābhiyukto prāgeva yāva sthitu bheṣyati dharmarājo // Rgs_23.4 //
K06bsu028pu:474: māro 'pi tasmi samaye bhavate saśalyo śokātu duḥkhitu anantamano 'lpasthāmo /
K06bsu028pu:475: diśadāha ulka kṣipate bhayadarśanārthaṃ kathameṣa dīnamanaso bhavi bodhisattvo // Rgs_24.1 //
K06bsu028pu:476: [yatha te bhavanti vidu āśayasaṃprayuktā divarātri prajñavarapāramitārthadarśī] /
K06bsu028pu:477: tada kāyacitta khagapakṣisatulyabhūtā avatāru so kutu labhiṣyati kṛṣṇabandhuḥ // Rgs_24.2 //
K06bsu028pu:478: kalahāvivādupagatā yada bodhisattvā bhonti parasparaviruddhaka ruṣṭacittāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:479: tada māra tuṣṭu bhavatī paramaṃ udagro ubhi eti dūra bhaviṣyanti jināna jñāne // Rgs_24.3 //
K06bsu028pu:480: ubhi eti dūri bhaviṣyanti piśācatulyā ubhi eti ātma kariṣyanti pratijñahānim /
K06bsu028pu:481: duṣṭāna kṣāntivikalāna kuto 'sti bodhi tada māru tuṣṭu bhavatī namucīsapakṣo // Rgs_24.4 //
K06bsu028pu:482: yo bodhisattva ayu vyākṛtu vyākṛtasmiṃ cittaṃ pradūṣayi vivādu samārabheyyā /
K06bsu028pu:483: yāvanti cittakṣaṇikā khiladoṣayuktās tāvanta kalpa puna saṃnahitavya bhonti // Rgs_24.5 //
K06bsu028pu:484: atha tasyupadyati matīti aśobhanā ti kṣāntīya pāramita bodhi spṛśanti buddhāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:485: pratidarśayāti puna āyati saṃvarāṇi apayāti vā sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme // Rgs_24.6 //
K06bsu028pu:487: yo śikṣamāṇu na upaiti kahiṃci śikṣāṃ na ca śikṣakaṃ labhati nāpi ca śikṣadharmān /
K06bsu028pu:488: śikṣā aśikṣa ubhayo avikalpamāno yo śikṣate sa iha śikṣati buddhadharme // Rgs_25.1 //
K06bsu028pu:489: yo bodhisattva imu jānati eva śikṣāṃ na sa jātu śikṣavikalo bhavate duśīlo /
K06bsu028pu:490: ārādhiteṣu iha śikṣati buddhadharmaṃ śikṣātiśikṣakuśalo ti nirūpalambho // Rgs_25.2 //
K06bsu028pu:491: śikṣantu eva vidu prajña prabhaṃkarāṇāṃ notpadyate akuśalamapi ekacittam /
K06bsu028pu:492: sūrye yathā gagani gacchati antarīkṣe raśmīgate na sthihate purato 'ndhakāram // Rgs_25.3 //
K06bsu028pu:493: prajñāya pāramita śikṣita saṃskṛtānāṃ sarveṣa pāramita bhontiha saṃgṛhītāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:494: satkāyadṛṣṭi yatha ṣaṣṭi duve ca dṛṣṭī antargatāstathami pāramitā bhavanti // Rgs_25.4 //
K06bsu028pu:495: yatha jīvitendriya niruddhi ya kecidanye bhontī niruddha pṛthu indriya yāvadasti /
K06bsu028pu:496: emeva prajñacarite vidu uttamānāṃ sarveta pāramita ukta ya saṃgṛhītā // Rgs_25.5 //
K06bsu028pu:497: ye cāpi śrāvakaguṇā tatha pratyayānāṃ sarveṣu bhonti vidu śikṣitu bodhisattvā /
K06bsu028pu:498: no cāpi tatra sthihatāna spṛheti teṣām ayu śikṣitavyamati śikṣati etamartham // Rgs_25.6 //
K06bsu028pu:500: avivartiyasya varabodhayi prasthitasya yo cittupādu anumoditu āśayena /
K06bsu028pu:501: trisahasra meru tulayitva siyāpramāṇo na tveva tasya kuśalasyanumodanāye // Rgs_26.1 //
K06bsu028pu:502: yāvanta sattva kuśalārthika mokṣakāmā sarveṣa bhonti anumoditu puṇyarāśi /
K06bsu028pu:503: sattvarthi te jinaguṇa ananta prāpuṇitvā dāsyanti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye // Rgs_26.2 //
K06bsu028pu:504: yo bodhisattva avikalpaku sarvadharmān śūnyānimitta parijānati niṣprapañcān /
K06bsu028pu:505: na ca prajña bodhi parieṣati āśayena so yukta prajñavarapāramitāya yogī // Rgs_26.3 //
K06bsu028pu:506: ākāśadhātu gaganasya siyā virodho na hi tena tasya kutu kenacideṣa prāptā /
K06bsu028pu:507: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo abhyovakāśasadṛśo upaśāntacārī // Rgs_26.4 //
K06bsu028pu:508: yatha māyakārapuruṣasya na eva bhoti te śiṣya māṃ janata so ca karoti kāryam /
K06bsu028pu:509: paśyanti taṃ vividha kāryu nidarśayantaṃ na ca tasya kāyu na pi citta na nāmadheyam // Rgs_26.5 //
K06bsu028pu:510: emeva prajñacarite na kadāci bhoti buddhitva bodhi jagatī parimocayitvā /
K06bsu028pu:511: ātmopapatti vividhāṃ kriyasaṃprayogāṃ darśeti māyasadṛśo na vikalpacārī // Rgs_26.6 //
K06bsu028pu:512: yatha buddha nirmita karoti ca buddhakāryaṃ na ca tasyupadyati mado karamāṇu kiṃcit /
K06bsu028pu:513: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo darśeti sarva kriya nirmitamāyatulyam // Rgs_26.7 //
K06bsu028pu:514: palagaṇḍa dakṣa vidunā kṛtu dāruyantro puruṣe stritulya sa karoti ha sarvakāryam /
K06bsu028pu:515: emeva prajñacarito vidu bodhisattvo jñānena sarva kriya kurvati nirvikalpo // Rgs_26.8 //
K06bsu028pu:517: evaṃ carantu vidu nā pṛthudevasaṃghāḥ kṛtaañjalīpuṭa praṇamya namasyayanti /
K06bsu028pu:518: buddhā pi yāvata daśaddiśi lokadhātau guṇavarṇamālaparikīrtana kurvayanti // Rgs_27.1 //
K06bsu028pu:519: yāvanti gaṅganadivālisame hi kṣetre sattvā ta sarvi parikalpa bhaveyu mārāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:520: ekaika roma puna tāntaka nirmiṇeyyā sarve na śakya karaṇe vidu antarāyam // Rgs_27.2 //
K06bsu028pu:521: catukāraṇehi balavāṃ vidu bodhisattvo bhavate dugharṣu catumāraasaṃprakampyo /
K06bsu028pu:522: śūnyāvihāri bhavate na ca sattvatyāgī yathavādi sattvakaruṇānugatāvasthānaḥ // Rgs_27.3 //
K06bsu028pu:523: yo bodhisattva adhimucyati bhāṣyamāṇām ima prajñapāramita māta tathāgatānām /
K06bsu028pu:524: pratipattiyā ca abhiyujyati āśayena sarvajñatāya abhiprasthitu veditavyo // Rgs_27.4 //
K06bsu028pu:525: na ca dharmadhātutathatāya upaiti sthānaṃ bhavatī athānasthita so laghu antarīkṣe /
K06bsu028pu:526: vidyādharo va abhilambhu vanābhiprāyā khagu kālahīna druma mantrabalādhiṣṭhāno // Rgs_27.5 //
K06bsu028pu:527: evaṃ carantu vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo na ca budhyakaṃ labhati nāpi ca buddhadharmān /
K06bsu028pu:528: na ca deśikaṃ na pi ca paśyaka dharmatāyāṃ śāntaiṣiṇāmayu vihāra guṇe ratānām // Rgs_27.6 //
K06bsu028pu:529: yāvanta śrāvakavihāra sapratyayānāṃ śāntā samādhipraśame sukhasaṃprayuktā /
K06bsu028pu:530: arhanvimokṣa sthapayitva tathāgatānāṃ sarveṣu agra ayu vihāru niruttaraśca // Rgs_27.7 //
K06bsu028pu:531: ākāśi pakṣi viharāti na co patāti dakamadhyi matsya viharāti na co marāti /
K06bsu028pu:532: emeva dhyānabalapāragu bodhisattvo śūnyāvihāri na ca nirvṛti prāpuṇāti // Rgs_27.8 //
K06bsu028pu:533: yo sarvasattvaguṇaagratu gantukāmo agraṃ spṛśeya paramādbhuta buddhajñānam /
K06bsu028pu:534: agraṃ dadeya vara uttamadharmadānam imu agru sevatu vihāru hitaṃkarāṇām // Rgs_27.9 //
K06bsu028pu:536: yāvanti śikṣa paridīpita nāyakena sarveṣa śikṣa ayu agru niruttarā ca /
K06bsu028pu:537: yaḥ sarvaśikṣavidu icchati pāra gantum imu prajñapāramita śikṣati buddhaśikṣām // Rgs_28.1 //
K06bsu028pu:538: agraṃ nidhāna ayu uttamadharmakośa buddhāna gotrajananaṃ sukhasaukhyagañjo /
K06bsu028pu:539: atikrāntanāgata daśaddiśi lokanāthā itu te prasūta na ca kṣīyati dharmadhātuḥ // Rgs_28.2 //
K06bsu028pu:540: yāvanti vṛkṣa phalapuṣpavanaspatī yā sarve ca medinisamudgata prādubhūtāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:541: na ca medinī kṣayamupaiti na cāpi vṛddhiṃ na ca khidyatī na parihāyati nirvikalpā // Rgs_28.3 //
K06bsu028pu:542: yāvanta buddhasama śrāvakapratyayāśca marutaśca sarvajagatī sukhasaukhyadharmāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:543: sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtā na ca kṣīyate na ca vivardhati jātu prajñā // Rgs_28.4 //
K06bsu028pu:544: yāvanta sattva mṛdumadhyamutkṛṣṭa loke sarve avidyaprabhavā sugatena uktāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:545: sāmagripratyayu pravartati duḥkhayantro na ca yantra kṣīyati avidya na cāpi vṛddhiḥ // Rgs_28.5 //
K06bsu028pu:546: yāvanti jñāna nayadvāra uyāyamūlāḥ sarve ti prajñavarapāramitāprasūtāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:547: sāmagripratyaya pravartati jñānayantro na ca prajñapāramita vardhati hīyate vā // Rgs_28.6 //
K06bsu028pu:548: yo tu pratītyasamutpādu anudbhavāye imu prajña akṣayata budhyati bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:549: so sūrya abhrapaṭale yatha muktaraśmī vidhamitvavidyapaṭalaṃ bhavate svayaṃbhūḥ // Rgs_28.7 //
K06bsu028pu:551: caturbhī ca dhyāna viharanti mahānubhāvā na ca ālayo na pi ca niśrayu kurvayāti /
K06bsu028pu:552: api kho punāśrayu ime catudhyāna sāṅgā bheṣyanti bodhivarauttamaprāpaṇāya // Rgs_29.1 //
K06bsu028pu:553: dhyāne sthito 'tra bhavatī varaprajñalābhī ārūpyarūpi ca samādhi catasra śreṣṭhā /
K06bsu028pu:554: upakāribhūta imi dhyāna varāgrabodhau na punāsravakṣati sa śikṣati bodhisattvo // Rgs_29.2 //
K06bsu028pu:555: āścaryamadbhutamidaṃ guṇasaṃcayānāṃ dhyāne samādhi viharanti nimitta nāsti /
K06bsu028pu:556: tatra sthitāna yadi bhajyati ātmabhāvo puna kāmadhātu upapadyati yathābhiprāyā // Rgs_29.3 //
K06bsu028pu:557: yatha jambudvīpaka manuṣya alabdhapūrvā divi devauttamapurā anuprāpuṇeyā /
K06bsu028pu:558: paśyitva te viṣaya tatra parigṛhītā punarāgameya na ca niśrayu tatra kuryāt // Rgs_29.4 //
K06bsu028pu:559: emeva te guṇadharā varabodhisattvā dhyāne samādhi viharitva prayuktayogī /
K06bsu028pu:560: puna kāmadhātusthita bhonti anopaliptā padmeva vāriṇi aniśrita bāladharme // Rgs_29.5 //
K06bsu028pu:561: anyatra sattvaparipācana kṣetraśodhī paripūraṇārtha imi pāramitā mahātmā /
K06bsu028pu:562: ārūpyadhātuupapatti na prārthayantī yatreha bodhiguṇapāramitāna hāni // Rgs_29.6 //
K06bsu028pu:563: yatha kaścideva puruṣo ratanaṃ nidhānaṃ labdhvā tu tatra spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
K06bsu028pu:564: ekāki so puna gṛhītva parasmi kāle gṛhṇitva geha praviśitva na bhoti lubdho // Rgs_29.7 //
K06bsu028pu:565: emeva dhyāna catureva samādhi śāntāṃ labdhvāna prīti sukhadāṃ vidu bodhisattvāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:566: avasṛjya dhyānasukhaprītisamādhilābhaṃ puna kāmadhātu praviśanti jagānukampī // Rgs_29.8 //
K06bsu028pu:567: yadi bodhisattva viharāti samādhidhyāne rahapratyayāni spṛhabuddhi na saṃjaneyyā /
K06bsu028pu:568: asamāhito bhavati uddhatakṣiptacitto parihīnabuddhiguṇa nāvika bhinnanāvo // Rgs_29.9 //
K06bsu028pu:569: kiṃcāpi rūpamapi śabda tathaiva gandho rasa sparśa kāmaguṇa pañcabhi yukta bhogī /
K06bsu028pu:570: rahapratyayāna vigato 'nantabodhisattvo satataṃ samāhitu prajānayitavya śūro // Rgs_29.10 //
K06bsu028pu:572: yatha kumbhadāsi avaśāvaśa bhartikasya tatha sarvasattvavaśatāmupayānti dhīrāḥ // Rgs_29.11 //
K06bsu028pu:573: na ca svāmikasya prativākyu dadāti dāsī ākruṣṭa cāpi athavā sada tāḍitā vā /
K06bsu028pu:574: ekāntatrastamanasā sa bhayābhibhūtā māmeva so anu vadhiṣyati kāraṇena // Rgs_29.12 //
K06bsu028pu:575: emeva bodhivaraprasthitu bodhisattvo tiṣṭheya sarvajagatī yatha preṣyabhūto /
K06bsu028pu:576: anu bodhiāgamu guṇāna ca pāripūrī tṛṇa agni kāṣṭhaprabhavo dahate tameva // Rgs_29.13 //
K06bsu028pu:577: avasṛjya ātma sugatāṃ parasattvakārye abhiyukta rātridiva niṣpratikāṅkṣacitto /
K06bsu028pu:578: māteva ekasutake paricāryamāṇo adhyāśaye na parikhinna upasthiheti // Rgs_29.14 //
K06bsu028pu:581: na ca khedabuddhi aṇumātra upādiyāti so vīryapāramitayukta atandritaśca // Rgs_30.1 //
K06bsu028pu:582: saci kalpakoṭi gaṇaye vidu bodhisattvo cirasaṃjña bodhi samudāniya tena duḥkhe /
K06bsu028pu:583: ciraduḥkha bheṣyati samācaramāṇu dharmaṃ tatu vīryapāramitahīna kusīdarūpo // Rgs_30.2 //
K06bsu028pu:584: prathamaṃ upādu varabodhayi cittupādo so vā anuttaraśivāmanuprāpuṇeyā /
K06bsu028pu:585: rātriṃdivaikamanasā tamadhiṣṭhiheyā ārambhavīrya vidu paṇḍitu veditavyo // Rgs_30.3 //
K06bsu028pu:586: saci kaścideva vadayeya sumeruśailaṃ bhinditva paśca adhigamyasi agrabodhim /
K06bsu028pu:587: saci khedabuddhi kurute ca pramāṇabuddhiṃ kausīdyaprāpta bhavate tada bodhisattvo // Rgs_30.4 //
K06bsu028pu:588: atha tasyupadyati matī kimutālpamātraṃ kṣaṇamātra bhasma nayatī vilayaṃ sumerum /
K06bsu028pu:589: ārambhavīrya bhavate vidu bodhisattvo nacireṇa bodhivara lapsyati nāyakānām // Rgs_30.5 //
K06bsu028pu:590: saci kāyacittavacasā ca parākrameyyā paripācayitva jagatī kariṣyāmi artham /
K06bsu028pu:591: kausīdyaprāpta bhavatī sthitu ātmasaṃjñaiḥ nairātmabhāvanavidūri nabhaṃ va bhūmeḥ // Rgs_30.6 //
K06bsu028pu:592: yasminna kāyu na pi citta na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvivarti sthitu advayadharmacārī /
K06bsu028pu:593: ayu vīryapāramita ukta hitaṃkareṇa ākāṅkṣamāṇu śivamacyutamagrabodhim // Rgs_30.7 //
K06bsu028pu:594: paruṣaṃ śruṇitva vacanaṃ parato duruktaṃ paritoṣayāti susukhaṃ vidu bodhisattvo /
K06bsu028pu:595: ko bhāṣate ka śṛṇute kutu kasya kena so yukta kṣāntivarapāramitāya vijño // Rgs_30.8 //
K06bsu028pu:596: so bodhisattva kṣamate guṇadharmayukto yaścaiva ratnabharitaṃ trisahasra dadyāt /
K06bsu028pu:597: buddhāna lokavidunārhatapratyayānāṃ kalapuṇya so na bhavate iha dānaskandhe // Rgs_30.9 //
K06bsu028pu:599: [sattvāna śūnyavaradharma niśāmayātī priyu bhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu vijño // Rgs_30.10 //
K06bsu028pu:600: saci kaści candanapuṭaṃ grahiyāna sattvo abhyokireya gurupremata bodhisattvam /
K06bsu028pu:601: dvitīyo 'pi] agni sakale śirasi kṣipeyā ubhayatra tulyu manu tena upāditavyo // Rgs_30.11 //
K06bsu028pu:602: evaṃ kṣamitva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo taṃ cittupādu pariṇāmayi agrabodhau /
K06bsu028pu:603: yāvanti kṣānti rahapratyayasattvadhātoḥ abhibhoti sarvajagatī kṣamamāṇu śūraḥ // Rgs_30.12 //
K06bsu028pu:604: kṣamamāṇu eva puna citta upāditavyo narakeṣu tiryayamaloki aneka duḥkhā /
K06bsu028pu:605: anubhūya kāmaguṇahetu akāmakārā kasmā hu adya na kṣameya nidāna bodhau // Rgs_30.13 //
K06bsu028pu:607: yāvanti duḥkha jagatī ahu tatsahāmi kṣāntīya pāramita tiṣṭhati bodhisattvo // Rgs_30.14 //
K06bsu028pu:609: śīlena udgata bhavanti samādhikāṅkṣī sthita gocare daśabalāna akhaṇḍaśīlāḥ /
K06bsu028pu:610: yāvanti saṃvarakriya anuvartayanti tāṃ sarvasattvahita bodhayi nāmayanti // Rgs_31.1 //
K06bsu028pu:611: saci pratyayānarahabodhi spṛhāṃ janeti [duḥśīla bhoti]viduṣāṃ tatha chidracārī /
K06bsu028pu:612: atha bodhi uttamaśivāṃ pariṇāmayanti sthitu śīlapāramita kāmaguṇebhi yukto // Rgs_31.2 //
K06bsu028pu:613: yo dharma bodhiguṇaāgamu sūratānāṃ so śīlaarthu guṇadharmasamanvitānām /
K06bsu028pu:614: yo dharma bodhiguṇahāni hitaṃkarāṇāṃ duḥśīlatā ayu prakāśitu nāyakena // Rgs_31.3 //
K06bsu028pu:615: yadi pañca kāmaguṇa bhuñjati bodhisattvo buddhaṃ ca dharma śaraṇāgatu āryasaṃgham /
K06bsu028pu:616: sarvajñatā ca manasī bhaviṣyāmi buddho sthitu śīlapāramita vedayitavya vijño // Rgs_31.4 //
K06bsu028pu:617: yadi kalpakoṭi daśabhī kuśalaiḥ pathebhiś caramāṇu pratyayarahatvaspṛhāṃ janeti /
K06bsu028pu:618: tada khaṇḍaśīlu bhavate api chidraśīlo pārājiko gurutaro ayu cittupādo // Rgs_31.5 //
K06bsu028pu:619: rakṣantu śīla pariṇāmayi agrabodhiṃ na ca tena manyati na ātmana karṣayethā /
K06bsu028pu:620: ahusaṃjñatā ca parivarjita sattvasaṃjñā sthitu śīlapāramiti vucyati bodhisattvo // Rgs_31.6 //
K06bsu028pu:621: yadi bodhisattva caramāṇu jināna mārge imi śīlavānimi duśīla karoti sattvān /
K06bsu028pu:622: nānātvasaṃjñaprasṛto paramaṃ duśīlo api chidraśīlu na tu so pariśuddhaśīlo // Rgs_31.7 //
K06bsu028pu:623: yasyo na asti ahasaṃjña na sattvasaṃjñā saṃjñāvirāgu kutu tasya asaṃvaro 'sti /
K06bsu028pu:624: yasyo na saṃvari asaṃvari manyanāsti ayu śīlasaṃvaru prakāśitu nāyakena // Rgs_31.8 //
K06bsu028pu:625: yo evaśīlasamanvāgatu niṣprapañco anapekṣako bhavati sarvapriyāpriyeṣu /
K06bsu028pu:626: śirahastapāda tyajamāna adīnacitto sarvāstityāgi bhavate satataṃ alīno // Rgs_31.9 //
K06bsu028pu:627: jñātvā ca dharmaprakṛtīṃ vaśikā nirātmyaṃ ātmāna māṃsa tyajamānu adīnacitto /
K06bsu028pu:628: prāgeva vastu tada bāhira nātyajeyā asthānameta yadi matsari so kareyā // Rgs_31.10 //
K06bsu028pu:629: ahasaṃjñatastu mamatā bhavate ca rāgo kutu tyāgabuddhi bhaviṣyati sā muhānām /
K06bsu028pu:630: mātsarya preta bhavate upapadyayātī athavā manuṣya tada bhoti daridrarūpo // Rgs_31.11 //
K06bsu028pu:631: tada bodhisattva imi jñātva daridrasattvān dānādhimukta bhavatī sada muktatyāgī /
K06bsu028pu:632: catvāri dvīpi samalaṃkṛtu kheṭatulyaṃ dattvā udagra bhavate na hi dvīpalabdho // Rgs_31.12 //
K06bsu028pu:633: dānaṃ daditva vidu paṇḍitu bodhisattvo yāvanti sattva tribhave samanvāharitvā /
K06bsu028pu:634: sarveṣu teṣu bhavate ayu dattadānaṃ taṃ cāgrabodhi pariṇāmayate jagārtham // Rgs_31.13 //
K06bsu028pu:635: na ca vastuniśrayu karoti daditva dānaṃ vidu pāku naiva pratikāṅkṣati so kadācit /
K06bsu028pu:636: evaṃ tyajitva bhavate vidu sarvatyāgī alpaṃ tyajitva labhate bahu aprameyam // Rgs_31.14 //
K06bsu028pu:637: yāvanta sattva tribhave nikhilena asti te sarvi dāna dadayanti anantakalpān /
K06bsu028pu:638: buddhānuloki vidu nārhatipratyayānāṃ yāvanti śrāvakaguṇān parikalpa sthāne // Rgs_31.15 //
K06bsu028pu:639: yaśco upāyakuśalo vidu bodhisattvo teṣāṃ sa puṇyakriyavastvanumodayitvā /
K06bsu028pu:640: sattvārtha agravarabodhayi nāmayeyā abhibhoti sarvajagatī pariṇāmayukto // Rgs_31.16 //
K06bsu028pu:641: kācasya vā maṇina rāśi siyā mahanto vaiḍūryaratna abhibhoti sa sarva eko /
K06bsu028pu:642: emeva sarvajagatī pṛthu dānaskandho abhibhoti sarvapariṇāmaku bodhisattvo // Rgs_31.17 //
K06bsu028pu:643: yadi bodhisattva dadamāna jagasya dānaṃ mamatāṃ na tatra karayenna ca vastuprema /
K06bsu028pu:644: tatu vardhate kuśalamūla mahānubhāvo candro va tatra prabhamaṇḍalu śuklapakṣe // Rgs_31.18 //
K06bsu028pu:646: dānena pretagati chindati bodhisattvo dāridrakaṃ ca chinatī tatha sarvakleśān /
K06bsu028pu:647: bhogāṃścanantavipulāṃ labhate caranto dānena sattva paripācayi kṛcchraprāptān // Rgs_32.1 //
K06bsu028pu:648: śīlena tīryagati varjayi nekarupām aṣṭau ca akṣaṇa kṣaṇāṃ labhate sa nityam /
K06bsu028pu:649: kṣāntīya rupa labhate paramaṃ udāraṃ suvarṇacchavi priyu jagasya udīkṣaṇīyo // Rgs_32.2 //
K06bsu028pu:650: vīryeṇa śuklaguṇa hāni na abhyupaiti jñānaṃ ananta labhate jinakośagañjam /
K06bsu028pu:651: dhyānena kāmaguṇa utsṛjate jugupsyān vidyā abhijña abhinirharate samādhim // Rgs_32.3 //
K06bsu028pu:652: prajñāya dharmaprakṛtī parijānayitvā traidhātukānta samatikramate apāyān /
K06bsu028pu:653: vartitva cakraratanaṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ deśeti dharma jagatī dukhasaṃkṣayāye // Rgs_32.4 //
K06bsu028pu:654: paripūrayitva imi dharma sa bodhisattvo api kṣetraśuddhi parigṛhṇati sattvaśuddhim /
K06bsu028pu:655: api buddhavaṃśa parigṛhṇati dharmavaṃśaṃ tatha saṃghavaṃśa parigṛhṇati sarvadharmān // Rgs_32.5 //
K06bsu028pu:656: vaidyottamo jagati rogacikitsakārī prajñopadeśa kathito ayu bodhimārgo /
K06bsu028pu:657: nāmena ratnaguṇasaṃcaya bodhimārgaḥ taṃ sarvasattva itu mārgatu prāpnuvanti // Rgs_32.6 //
K06bsu028pu:660: lokaṃ prāpayituṃ sukhena padavīṃ saṃpaddūyāvāhinīṃ kāruṇyāhitacetasā bhagavatā buddhena saṃdīpitam /
K06bsu028pu:661: śrutvā te 'khiladharmatattvanilayaṃ sūtraṃ samādānato gatvā sthānamaharniśaṃ nijamalaṃ dhmāyantu ye 'bhyāgatāḥ // Rgs_HPr_1 //
K06bsu028pu:662: kāle 'smin bahudṛṣṭisaṃkulakalau pāṭhe 'pi dūraṃ gate gāthābhedamanekapustakagataṃ dṛṣṭvādhunā nyāyataḥ /
K06bsu028pu:663: kūpaṃ vādigajendrakumbhadaraṇe bhadreṇa yā śodhitā lokārthaṃ hariṇā mayā suvihitā seyaṃ budhairgṛhyatām // Rgs_HPr_2 //
K06bsu028pu:664: āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyā bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parivartānusāreṇa bhagavatī ratnaguṇasaṃcayagāthā samāptā //
K06bsu028pu:665: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
K06bsu028pu:666: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
K06bsu028pu:668: yo 'sau dharmaṃ sugatagaditaṃ paṭhate bhaktibhāvān mātrāhīnaṃ kathamapi padaṃ pādagāthākṣaraṃ vā /
K06bsu028pu:669: jihvādoṣaiḥ pavanacaritaiḥ śleṣmadoṣapracārair yūyaṃ buddhāḥ subhavanagatā bodhisattvāḥ kṣamadhvam // Rgs_LPr_1 //
